biotools.summary: MicroScope is a user-friendly ChIP-seq and RNA-seq software suite for the interactive visualization and analysis of genomic data and includes integrated features to support differential expression analysis, interactive heatmap production, principal component analysis, gene ontology analysis, and dynamic network analysis.

bioschemas.name: MicroScope
bioschemas.summary: MicroScope is a user-friendly ChIP-seq and RNA-seq software suite for the interactive visualization and analysis of genomic data and includes integrated features to support differential expression analysis, interactive heatmap production, principal component analysis, gene ontology analysis, and dynamic network analysis.
